column5: EnvironnementInformation technologies have led to the new era of communication which in turn has rapidly changed many aspects of society from individual behaviours to the global economy. Numerous services have become very common such as calling and sending emails from almost everywhere, purchasing online, watching digital TV through ADSL connections or via satellite digital broadcast, travelling using GPS, etc. All these applications necessarily rely on fixed and mobile networks that are based on sophisticated telecommunication systems and complex infrastructures.
column7: Non-European students : 5,100 euros/ year - European students : 3,000 euros/ year
